text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ParticipationType where concept is-a RCT

name: ParticipationRecordTarget
title: ParticipationRecordTarget
description: The record target indicates whose medical record holds the documentation of this act. This is especially important when the subject of a service is not the patient himself.
